Package OntologyTools

Class DLQueryEngine

java.lang.Object
OntologyTools.DLQueryEngine
public class DLQueryEngine
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the one that contains the methods to perform queries on the given ontology using an HermiT reasoner.
Author:

  • Constructor Details

    • DLQueryEngine

      public DLQueryEngine​(org.semanticweb.HermiT.Reasoner reasoner, org.semanticweb.owlapi.util.ShortFormProvider shortFormProvider)
      Constructs a DLQueryEngine. This will answer "DL queries" using the specified reasoner. A short form provider specifies how entities are rendered.
      Parameters:
      reasoner - The reasoner to be used for answering the queries.
      shortFormProvider - A short form provider.

  • Method Details

    • getSuperClasses

      public java.util.Set<org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass> getSuperClasses​(java.lang.String classExpressionString, boolean direct) throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.expression.ParserException
      Gets the superclasses of a class expression parsed from a string.
      Parameters:
      classExpressionString - The string from which the class expression will be parsed.
      direct - Specifies whether direct superclasses should be returned or not.
      Returns:
      The superclasses of the specified class expression
      Throws:
      org.semanticweb.owlapi.expression.ParserException - If there was a problem parsing the class expression.

    • getEquivalentClasses

      public java.util.Set<org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass> getEquivalentClasses​(java.lang.String classExpressionString) throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.expression.ParserException
      Gets the equivalent classes of a class expression parsed from a string.
      Parameters:
      classExpressionString - The string from which the class expression will be parsed.
      Returns:
      The equivalent classes of the specified class expression
      Throws:
      org.semanticweb.owlapi.expression.ParserException - If there was a problem parsing the class expression.

    • getIndividualsProperty

      public java.util.Set<org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLNamedIndividual> getIndividualsProperty​(java.lang.String propertyExpressionString, java.lang.String IndExpressionString)
      Gets the individuals of the ontology to which the specified ObjectProperty is pointing from the specified origin individual of the ontology.
      Parameters:
      propertyExpressionString - is the ObjectProperty that links both individuals
      IndExpressionString - is the individual of origin of the relation established by the ObjectProperty
      Returns:
      Set containing all the individuals of the query

    • getInstances

      public java.util.Set<org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLNamedIndividual> getInstances​(java.lang.String classExpressionString, boolean direct) throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.expression.ParserException
      Gets the instances of a class expression parsed from a string.
      Parameters:
      classExpressionString - The string from which the class expression will be parsed.
      direct - Specifies whether direct instances should be returned or not.
      Returns:
      The instances of the specified class expression
      Throws:
      org.semanticweb.owlapi.expression.ParserException - If there was a problem parsing the class expression.

    • checkClass

      public java.util.Set<org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLNamedIndividual> checkClass​(java.util.Set<org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLNamedIndividual> originalSet, java.lang.String classExpressionString, boolean direct) throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.expression.ParserException
      Gets the individuals of a Set that belong to the specified class in the ontology.
      Parameters:
      originalSet - is a Set of ontology individuals.
      classExpressionString - is a class to filter the individuals.
      direct - Specifies whether direct instances should be returned or not.
      Returns:
      a new Set containing only the individuals form the original Set that belong to the specified class
      Throws:
      org.semanticweb.owlapi.expression.ParserException
